ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'

about.summary: Send push notifications to mobile devices or the desktop using 'Pushover' <https://pushover.net>. These notifications can display things such as results, job status, plots, or any other text or numeric data.

Send push notifications to mobile devices or the desktop using 'Pushover' <https://pushover.net>. These notifications can display things such as results, job status, plots, or any other text or numeric data.

name: r-pushoverr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1.0' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-pushoverr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/pushoverr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/pushoverr/pushoverr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 626e15e829edc1457570aab590d3a1038b59f906eb1d270e4a158009a539aa16

build:
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  noarch: generic

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip  # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-checkmate
    - r-cli
    - r-glue
    - r-httr
    - r-rlang

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-checkmate
    - r-cli
    - r-glue
    - r-httr
    - r-rlang

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('pushoverr')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('pushoverr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://briandconnelly.github.io/pushoverr/, https://github.com/briandconnelly/pushoverr
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  summary: Send push notifications to mobile devices or the desktop using 'Pushover' <https://pushover.net>.
    These notifications can display things such as results, job status, plots, or any
    other text or numeric data.
  license_family: BSD
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/BSD_2_clause'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:
